definition: name of several rivers/North Luo river, tributary of Wei river 渭河|渭河[Wei4 He2] in Shaanxi
used in transliteration
surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
river/CL:條|条[tiao2],道[dao4]

sentences.english: Luo River Bridge Reinforcement by Anchor Jetting Concrete Tech.
sentences.chinese: 采用锚喷混凝土技术加固洛河大桥。

sentences.english: The paper also takes Beiluo River as an example to depict the prospects of harnessing the lower course of the Yellow River.
sentences.chinese: 文中还以北洛河为例，给出黄河下游河道的治理前景。

sentences.english: The dualistic water cycle model as a case study with Yiluo river basin is established.
sentences.chinese: 以伊洛河流域为实例研究，构建了二元水循环模型。
